import datetime
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
source.26d3396f: df1=df.loc[:,['Beach Name','Measurement Timestamp','Water Temperature','Turbidity','Wave Height','Wave Period']]
source.f74b0c9e:
df_Montrose=df1[df1['Beach Name']=='Montrose Beach']
df_OhioStreet=df1[df1['Beach Name']=='Montrose Beach']
df_Calumet=df1[df1['Beach Name']=='Calumet Beach']
df_63rdStreet=df1[df1['Beach Name']=='63rd Street Beach']
df_Osterman=df1[df1['Beach Name']=='Osterman Beach']
df_Rainbow=df1[df1['Beach Name']=='Rainbow Beach']
source.4e1203c0:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))
plt.subplot(241)
df1.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Average Height')

plt.subplot(242)
df_Montrose.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Montrose Average Height')


plt.subplot(243)
df_OhioStreet.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('OhioStreet Average Height')

plt.subplot(244)
df_Calumet.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Calumet Average Height')

plt.subplot(245)
df_63rdStreet.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('63rdStreet Average Height')

plt.subplot(246)
df_Osterman.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Osterman Average Height')

plt.subplot(247)
df_Rainbow.groupby('Year')['Wave Height'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Rainbow Average Height')

plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=1)
source.4c9cac20:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))
plt.subplot(241)
df1.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Water Temperature')

plt.subplot(242)
df_Montrose.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Montrose Water Temperature')


plt.subplot(243)
df_OhioStreet.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('OhioStreet Water Temperature')

plt.subplot(244)
df_Calumet.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Calumet Water Temperature')

plt.subplot(245)
df_63rdStreet.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('63rdStreet Water Temperature')

plt.subplot(246)
df_Osterman.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Osterman Water Temperature')

plt.subplot(247)
df_Rainbow.groupby('Year')['Water Temperature'].mean().plot.bar()
plt.title('Rainbow Water Temperature')

plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=1)
source.c96ba881:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,15))
plt.subplot(331)
sns.heatmap(df1.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('Correlation')

plt.subplot(332)
sns.heatmap(df_Montrose.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('df_Montrose Correlation') 

plt.subplot(333)
sns.heatmap(df_OhioStreet.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('df_OhioStreet Correlation')

plt.subplot(334)
sns.heatmap(df_Calumet.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('df_Calumet Correlation')

plt.subplot(335)
sns.heatmap(df_63rdStreet.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('df_63rdStreet Correlation')

plt.subplot(336)
sns.heatmap(df_Osterman.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('df_Osterman Correlation')

plt.subplot(337)
sns.heatmap(df_Rainbow.corr(),annot=True, fmt='1.1f')
plt.title('df_Rainbow Correlation')

plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=1.5)
plt.subplots_adjust(wspace=0.5)
